VIII.iv.3.A.1.a
.
Establishing Entitlement to TDIU
To establish entitlement to a total disability rating for compensation based on individual unemployability (IU), the Veteran must be unemployable in fact (unable to secure or follow substantially gainful employment) by reason of service-connected (SC) disability
and either
meet the schedular requirements of
38 CFR 4.16(a)
, or
have an extra-schedular IU evaluation, under the provisions of
38 CFR 4.16(b)
, approved by Compensation Service.
Notes
:
IU is also referred to as
total disability based on individual unemployability
(TDIU).
Marginal employment (to include employment in a protected environment), does not preclude a Veteran from eligibility to IU benefits.
